channel.title: Where do your songs come from?
channel.description:
Hello,
I just wanted to apologize if I ever offended anyone. That is not the kind of person I am and what I would like to know as. I never meant to offend anyone. I hope to be more involved in the community in the future.
I have an EP coming out in a while.
For me to know more about the people in the community I wanted to ask you guys a question
When you create a new song, do you get your inspiration from songs your listen to or do you create songs organically and see how it will sound?

item.title: Where do your songs come from?
item.dc:creator: LimeZ
item.description:
Some were from sounds I heard. Others were from experimentation or thinking up different melodies or basslines.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Where do your songs come from?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
I goes one of two ways for me:
Way the first - I hear a cool song that someone else made and I try to emulate it in my own way
Way the second - I fiddle around in Auxy until I make something cool. Then, it just goes from there.

Usually I go the second route, but still use the first way for parts of the song.
Overall though, pretty much all of my music is inspired by the music I hear in my favorite video games.

Read full topic
